short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that utilizes AI to automatically group and efficiently manage browsing tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically categorize tabs (powered by AI) .Display them in one page with a hierarchical directory.

Basic Features:
●One-click automated creation of categorized tab groups (OpenAI API key input required).

Pro Features:
●Display all categorized or uncategorized tab groups in a single page, showcasing them in a hierarchical structure.
●Ability to close tabs or groups within the hierarchical tab structure page.
●Provide the option to save classified groups as bookmarks or in Markdown format.

Requirements:
●OpenAI API key input required in the option page to utilize the automatic categorization feature.
